snippet.title: Skyrim Mash Up - Minecraft Xbox 360 OFFICIAL Trailer
snippet.description:
Mojang, 4J Studios and Microsoft Unveil  "The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim" Minecraft: Xbox 360 Mash-Up Pack!

Enjoy and make sure to check out our other trailers!
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL62B59CDBC65AE05B

Today at Minecon 2013, Mojang, Bethesda Game Studios, Bethesda Softworks, and Microsoft Studios proudly announced the development of "The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim" Mash-Up pack for Minecraft: Xbox 360 Edition. Coming soon, this new pack will transform the legendary world of "The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim" into the iconic, pixelated look of Minecraft. 

Developed by 4J Studios, "The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim" Mash-Up  features an exclusive Skyrim-themed texture set, 40 character skins, themed menus and user interface, craftable items, and more than 20 iconic selections  from "The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim" original game soundtrack. The comprehensive pack also includes a stunning pre-made world, recreating the memorable areas of Whiterun, Riverwood, and Bleak Falls Barrow.
